queries.item: CREATE TABLE `?:address_deliveries` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `description` Text DEFAULT NULL, `address` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, `latitude` VARCHAR(50), `longitude` VARCHAR(50), `is_default` tinyint(1) DEFAULT 1, `user_id` int(11) DEFAULT 0, `created_at` timestamp, `updated_at` timestamp, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;

CREATE TABLE `?:address_delivery_orders` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `order_id` int(11) DEFAULT 0, `address_id` int(11) DEFAULT 0, `driver_id` int(11) DEFAULT 0, `created_at` timestamp, `updated_at` timestamp, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;
